did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.physdesc: Correspondence, Diaries, Printed Materials, Publications, Audio Recordings.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Letters, diaries, deeds and other papers of the related Shanklin and Avery families.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Letters, diaries, deeds and other papers of the related Shanklin and Avery families; diary of John Gilbert Shanklin of Evansville, Indiana, in which he wrote of people and places observed on a summer trip through the northwestern United States, 1863; deeds, appraisals, indentures and other legal papers, 1828-1873, mostly involving land in Evansville; cancelled checks, receipts, bills, 1828-1868; also, playbills, programs, clippings, and miscellaneous items; taped interview with transcript of Malvina Harlan Shanklin, 1959, in which she provides reminiscences of her early life.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Shanklin and Avery family papers, #1635. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
